short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts authorization string for Telegram Mini Apps from web version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome Extension that helps to get authorization from any Mini App using Telegram Web version, even if the app does not work in Web version.

Open the mini-app in the Telegram Web, than click "Check" and "Copy". Done!

Created for this project: https://t.me/AutoBlumFarm
